name: Olympic Games Massacre
description:
Look at this scary monster !

When Olympic games turning into nightmares, Olympian can still participate. Get ready to run, jump and shot in this little one player game.

Controls for The First Mini-game :

Left & Right : Move

Controls for The Second Mini-game :

Left & Right : Move

Spacebar : Jump

Controls for The Third Mini-game :

Left and Right Click : Shot

Escape to leave the game

Game made by :

-Camille Balmer: Programmer(https://www.facebook.com/CamCamstudio)

-Dorian Haushalter: Game Designer

-Aurélien Montero: Sound designer and composer

-Pierre Parisot: 2D Artist

Don’t forget to rate the game and leave us your most scary commentary down below ! :)
